definition: the practical application of science to commerce or industry
details:
noun
- the practical application of science to commerce or industry
= synonyms: technology
- a room (as on a ship) in which the engine is located
= synonyms: engine room
- the discipline dealing with the art or science of applying scientific knowledge to practical problems
= example: the discipline dealing with the art or science of applying scientific knowledge to practical problems
= synonyms: technology
